00020 // ParamSet Macros
00021 #define ADD_PARAM_TYPE(T, vec) \
00022         (vec).push_back(new ParamSetItem<T>(name, (T *)data, nItems))
00023 #define LOOKUP_PTR(vec) \
00024         for (u_int i = 0; i < (vec).size(); ++i) \
00025                 if ((vec)[i]->name == name) { \
00026                         *nItems = (vec)[i]->nItems; \
00027                         (vec)[i]->lookedUp = true; \
00028                         return (vec)[i]->data; \
00029                 } \
00030         return NULL
00031 #define LOOKUP_ONE(vec) \
00032         for (u_int i = 0; i < (vec).size(); ++i) { \
00033                 if ((vec)[i]->name == name && \
00034                         (vec)[i]->nItems == 1) { \
00035                         (vec)[i]->lookedUp = true; \
00036                         return *((vec)[i]->data); \
00037 }               } \
00038         return d

00117 template <class T> struct ParamSetItem {
00118         // ParamSetItem Public Methods
00119         ParamSetItem<T> *Clone() const {
00120                 return new ParamSetItem<T>(name, data, nItems);
00121         }
00122         ParamSetItem(const string &name, const T *val, int nItems = 1);
00123         ~ParamSetItem() {
00124                 delete[] data;
00125         }
00126         // ParamSetItem Data
00127         string name;
00128         int nItems;
00129         T *data;
00130         bool lookedUp;
00131 };
00132 // ParamSetItem Methods
00133 template <class T>
00134 ParamSetItem<T>::ParamSetItem(const string &n,
00135                                                           const T *v,
00136                                                           int ni) {
00137         name = n;
00138         nItems = ni;
00139         data = new T[nItems];
00140         for (int i = 0; i < nItems; ++i)
00141                 data[i] = v[i];
00142         lookedUp = false;
00143 }

00145 class COREDLL TextureParams {
00146 public:
00147         // TextureParams Public Methods
00148         TextureParams(const ParamSet &geomp, const ParamSet &matp,
00149                         map<string, Reference<Texture<float> > > &ft,
00150                         map<string, Reference<Texture<Spectrum> > > &st)
00151                 : geomParams(geomp),
00152                   materialParams(matp),
00153                   floatTextures(ft),
00154                   spectrumTextures(st) {
00155         }
00156         Reference<Texture<Spectrum> > GetSpectrumTexture(const string &name,
00157                         const Spectrum &def) const;
00158         Reference<Texture<float> > GetFloatTexture(const string &name,
00159                         float def) const;
00160         float FindFloat(const string &n, float d) const {
00161                 return geomParams.FindOneFloat(n,
00162                         materialParams.FindOneFloat(n, d));
00163         }
00164         string FindString(const string &n) const {
00165                return geomParams.FindOneString(n, materialParams.FindOneString(n, ""));
00166         }
00167         int FindInt(const string &n, int d) const {
00168                return geomParams.FindOneInt(n, materialParams.FindOneInt(n, d));
00169         }
00170         bool FindBool(const string &n, bool d) const {
00171                return geomParams.FindOneBool(n, materialParams.FindOneBool(n, d));
00172         }
00173         Point FindPoint(const string &n, const Point &d) const {
00174                return geomParams.FindOnePoint(n, materialParams.FindOnePoint(n, d));
00175         }
00176         Vector FindVector(const string &n, const Vector &d) const {
00177                return geomParams.FindOneVector(n, materialParams.FindOneVector(n, d));
00178         }
00179         Normal FindNormal(const string &n, const Normal &d) const {
00180                return geomParams.FindOneNormal(n, materialParams.FindOneNormal(n, d));
00181         }
00182         Spectrum FindSpectrum(const string &n, const Spectrum &d) const {
00183                return geomParams.FindOneSpectrum(n, materialParams.FindOneSpectrum(n, d));
00184         }
00185         void ReportUnused() const {
00186                 geomParams.ReportUnused();
00187                 materialParams.ReportUnused();
00188         }
00189 private:
00190         // TextureParams Private Data
00191         const ParamSet &geomParams, &materialParams;
00192         map<string,
00193             Reference<Texture<float> > > &floatTextures;
00194         map<string,
00195             Reference<Texture<Spectrum> > > &spectrumTextures;
00196 };
